name: Chef Breakout
description:
Play one of 3 game mod

  • Arcade mode: Shoot at an infinite amount of boxes coming at you, catch the dropping ingredients and avoid trash!
  • Recipe mode: Shoot the boxes and catch the ingredients your recipe demands
  • Clear out mode: Shoot all boxes before they cross the line and don't let any ingredients fall

Fonts Used

  • Pixeled
  • Lazy dog
